statements.query: MATCH (n:GCPFunctionUser)<-[:USES]-(:GCPFunction) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Delete GCP Function Users that no longer exist and detach them from all previously connected nodes.

statements.query: MATCH (:GCPFunctionUser)<-[r:USES]-(:GCPFunction) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Remove GCP Function Users to Function relationships that are out of date
